skill_constraints: Severe bottleneck on senior.dev1 for DirectX and DICOM tasks.
resource_bottlenecks: Specialized graphics and DICOM skills (1 developer).
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive pair programming and knowledge transfer; risk of burnout for key resource.

skill_constraints: Reduced bottleneck, but requires ramp-up time and coordination for the new contractor.
resource_bottlenecks: Integration and code review for contractor.
mitigation_strategies: Add one Senior WPF/DirectX Contractor for 12 weeks to assist senior.dev1. This frees up senior.dev1 to focus on DICOM and architecture.
